Bodhisattvas, wishing to bring to maturity, contemplating skillful means and practices, transforming and liberating the realms of sentient beings,
First, wishing to bring about maturity; second, universally contemplating and practicing wisdom to penetrate all worlds.

1. Wishing to bring one to maturity, all pervade the worlds. 2. The wisdom of contemplating and practicing pervades all. 3. The wisdom of contemplating and observing the realm of nirvana. 4. Skillfully subsuming the realm of sentient beings, severing all

discourses and severed practices and attachments. 5. All skillfully abide in entering the Dharma practices of boundless middle way. 6. All contemplate and observe the karmic retributions of sentient beings, neither losing nor attaining. 7. All contemplate and observe the realm of sentient beings, skillfully giving rise to the supreme expedient of the faculty of faith. 8. All skillfully uphold the wisdom of receiving and upholding the meanings, phrases, and flavors spoken by the tathÄgatas of the past, future, and present. 9. All skillfully abide in entering the Dharma practices of boundless middle way, mundane and supramundane. 10. All skillfully observe the Dharma practices of the three times, conditioned and unconditioned, beyond measure. 11. All attain the stages of the wisdom of the tathÄgatas of the past, future, and present in sequence without interruption.

All of this is done while being endowed with the past, future, and present tathÄgatas,

Just as in the east, so it is in the south, west, north, southeast, southwest, northwest, northeast, above and below, in countless, innumerable, inconceivable, immeasurable, indescribable worlds, all filled with devas, dragons, yakshas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kinnaras, mahoragas, shakras, brahma kings, world guardians, humans, non-humans, and so forth;

If sentient beings, having seen the Tathagata, are to be liberated, those sentient beings will stand in front of the Tathagata at a distance of one fathom, and see the Tathagata abiding in various physical deportments. Those sentient beings who are to be liberated, the sentient beings will see the Tathagata abiding in various physical deportments in front of them.
